<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/project/{id}/notifications"}
  context={"endpoint"}

</MethodEndpoint>



Update Project notifications settings for current user

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","description":"A unique project ID","example":"5e9602e7a39e5a46428b457f","allowEmptyValue":false,"required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"severity":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":1,"example":1,"description":"* `1` - only errors (default)\n* `3` - error and timeouts\n"},"email":{"type":"boolean","example":true,"description":"Send email notifications or not"},"pagerduty":{"type":"boolean","example":true,"description":"Send [PagerDuty](https://www.pagerduty.com/) notifications"},"pushover":{"type":"boolean","example":true,"description":"Send [PushHover](https://pushover.net/) notifications"},"pushbullet":{"type":"boolean","example":true,"description":"Send [PushBullet](https://www.pushbullet.com/) notifications"},"slack":{"type":"boolean","example":true,"description":"Send [Slack](https://slack.com/) notifications"}},"title":"Notifications"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
